info.title: Marketplace
info.description: The Marketplace APIs allow developers to access data related to their app and its usage in the marketplace.

post.description:
Send app notifications to the Zoom Activity Center. (Note: This API endpoint only supports OAuth 2.0.)

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `app:notification:read`,`app:notification:write`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:write:notifications`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `400`
Invalid parameter: message
**Error Code:** `400`
Invalid parameter: text
**Error Code:** `400`
Invalid parameter: user_id

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `124`
Invalid access token.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `403`
Authenticated user has not permitted access to the targeted resource.
**Error Code:** `403`
App does not support notification feature.
**Error Code:** `403`
Account does not support notification feature.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

500.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `500`
Internal Server Error **Error Code:** `500`
Notification request sending failed.

get.description:
Get custom field values for user.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_custom_fields:read`,`marketplace_custom_fields:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:read:custom_fields:admin`,`marketplace:read:custom_fields`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

200.description:
Returns app-level custom field values configured by the user. 
Does not return any user-configured passwords.

field_id.description: Field ID: The values of this field are used as dynamic variables

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `1001`
Invalid user

401.description:

**Error Code:** `1403`

app is not found

get.summary: Get user or account event subscription
get.description:
Returns event subscriptions for users or accounts.

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token paginates through a large set of results. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: subscription_scope
parameters.description:
The app event subscription's scope
* `user` — The app event subscription is for specific users.
* `account` — The app event subscription is for all users in the account. 
* `master_account` — The app event subscription is for all users in the master account.

200.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `200`    User's event subscriptions for application returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token paginates through a large set of results. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

events.description: The list of the subscribed event subscriptions.

subscription_scope.description:
The app event subscription's scope
* `user` — The app event subscription is for specific users.
* `account` — The app event subscription is for all users in the account. 
* `master_account` — The app event subscription is for all users in the master account.

created_source.description:
The app's created source: 
* `default` — The app event subscriptions created in build flow. 
* `openapi` — The app event subscriptions created in open API.

allOf.description: The information about the user's event subscription.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `1500`
The subscription scope is invalid.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist or does not belong to this account.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

subscription_scope.description:
The app event subscription's scope
* `user` — The app event subscription is for specific users.
* `account` — The app event subscription is for all users in the account. 
* `master_account` — The app event subscription is for all users in the master account.

201.description: **HTTP Status Code:** `201` user create event subscription successfully.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `1003`
The user {$userId} missed permission to subscribe application events: {$eventName}
**Error Code:** `1300`
The user don't authorize the app: {$userId}.
**Error Code:** `1602`
The event is not allowed for the app: {$eventName}
**Error Code:** `1500`
The events list is empty.
**Error Code:** `1500`
The event webhook url is empty.
**Error Code:** `1500 `
The subscription scope is invalid.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist or does not belong to this account: {$userId}.
**Error Code:** `1601`
App event not exists: {$eventName}
**Error Code:** `1701`
The event webhook url validate failed: {eventWebhookUrl}.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: The user's ID list, list's max size is 10, seperated by a comma.

get.description:
List all active and past app requests, or list all approved public and private apps. 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:read:list_apps:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Types of app requests to query: 
* `active_requests` — All active app requests. 
* `past_requests` - All past app requests. 
* `public` - All public apps. 
* `account_created` - All apps created by this account. 
* `account_added` - All apps added by this account. 
* `approved_apps` - All approved apps by this account.
* `restricted_apps` - All restricted apps by this account.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

apps.description: Information about the app's user requests.

app_type.description:
The type of app: 
* `ZoomApp` — A Zoom app. 
* `ChatBotApp` — A ChatBot app. 
* `OAuthApp` — A OAuth app.
* `GeneralApp` — A General app.

app_usage.description:
The app's usage categorization: 
* `1` — The app is under admin management. 
* `2` — Users have access to the app.

app_status.description:
The app's publication status: 
* `PUBLISHED` — The app is published. 
* `UNPUBLISHED` — The app is not published.
* `SHARABLE` — The app is sharable.

request_total_number.description: The total number of app requests.

request_pending_number.description: The total number of pending app requests.

request_approved_number.description: The total number of approved app requests. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

request_declined_number.description: The total number of declined app requests. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

latest_request_date_time.description: The latest app request's creation date and time. This field only returns when the `type` value is 'active'.

reviewer_name.description: The user who reviewed the app request. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

review_date_time.description: The time at which the user reviewed the app request. This field only returns when the `type` value is `past`.

app_developer_type.description:
The developer type of app: 
* `THIRD_PARTY` — app created by the third party. 
* `ZOOM` — app created by ZOOM. 
* `INTERNAL` — app created by your account members.

scope_name.example: View all users' team chat messages

scope_description.example: This app will gain access to the team chat channels. Please review its privacy policy first.

restricted_time.description: The time when the application was resticted.

approved_type.description: The approved type of app: * `forAllUser` — all user unber account are approved to authorize the app. * `forSpecificUser` —  specific user or group are approved to authorize or use the app.

approver_id.description: The user's ID who approved the app.

approved_time.description: The time when the application was approved.

app_approval_closed.description: The app approval closed : * true — The app does not require admin approval for authorization. * false — The app requires admin approval for authorization.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `1505`
Internal server error, please try again.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Create `Server to Server OAuth`, `Meeting SDK` or `General` apps in the Zoom Marketplace. 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:write`,`marketplace_app:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:write:app`,`marketplace:write:app:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

requestBody.description:
/v2/marketplace/apps needs to pass the manifest parameter to create a General app.
/v2/marketplace/apps/accounts/{accountld} needs to pass other parameters to create Server OAuth, Meeting SDK app.

app_type.description:
The app's type: 
* `s2s_oauth` — Server to Server OAuth app. 
* `meeting_sdk` — Meeting SDK app.
* `general`— UBF General app.

scopes.description:
The scopes of the created app:
* `s2s_oauth` — If `active` field is true, there must be at least one scope. 
* `meeting_sdk` — Will automatically include `user_zak:read` scope.

active.description:
Only valid for s2s_oauth app, whether to activate automatically: 
* `true` — Automatically activate the app after creation. It is required that at least one scope should be included in the input parameter. 
* `false` — Do not activate the app after creation.

publish.description:
Only valid for meeting_sdk app, whether to publish the app to the Marketplace: 
* `true` — The app contains development credentials and production credentials. 
* `false` — The app contains only development credentials.

manifest.description:
An app manifest object. It should meet the valid manifest schema. If the app_type equals general, you need to pass this param.

Manifest resources: https://developers.zoom.us/docs/build-flow/manifests/

created_at.description: Date and time this app was created.

app_type.description:
The app's type: 
* `s2s_oauth` — Server to Server OAuth app. 
* `meeting_sdk` — Meeting SDK app.

production_credentials.description: Only when the type is `meeting_sdk` and the `publish` field is true, there will be `production_credentials`

development_credentials.description: Only when the type is `meeting_sdk` and the `publish` field is true, there will be `production_credentials`

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `300`
* Validation Failed.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `201`
* Invalid access token.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1500`
* The request body is missing required fields. For more information, see the API documentation. * Only `Server to Server OAuth` and `Meeting SDK` apps can be created. * Can't get account owner info. * Only account's owner can use this API. * Can't get account info.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Use this API to get app information. 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:read:admin`,`marketplace_app:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:read:app`,`marketplace:read:app:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

app_type.description:
The type of app: 
* `ZoomApp` — A Zoom app. 
* `ChatBotApp` — A ChatBot app. 
* `OAuthApp` — A OAuth app.

app_usage.description:
The app's usage categorization: 
* `1` — The app is under admin management. 
* `2` — Users have access to the app.

app_status.description:
The app's publication status: 
* `PUBLISHED` — The app is published. 
* `UNPUBLISHED` — The app is not published.

terms_of_use_url.description: The app's terms of use link.

user_role.description:
The user roles required to authorize or add the app: 
* `admin` — The user needs to have the ADMIN_MANAGEMENT role. 
* `user` — Every user can add this app.

min_client_version.description: The minimum client version required for the app.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
APP ID does not exist: {$appId}

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

delete.description:
Permanently delete an app on behalf of a user.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:write`,`marketplace_app:write:admin`

get.description:

parameters.name: next_page_token

parameters.name: duration

post.description:
Create a Zoom App Deeplink.


**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:write:app_deeplink:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

type.description:
The type of deeplink. This value defaults to `1`.
`1` - Generate a deeplink that opens Zoom App in-meeting if the meeting is in progress, if not opens Zoom App in Apps Tab.
`2` - Generate a deeplink that refreshes Chat App Webview.

action.description: The action of the deeplink, it's a user-defined string. Default length 2000, max length 9000.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `300`
Invalid action. Exceeded the maximum length of the value.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `124`
Invalid access token.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: $appId.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

post.description:
This API supports modifying the pre approval configuration of the app, including turning on the setting  to the  account, to specified users, to specified user groups, and turning off the pre approval.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:write:app_pre_approve:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

action.description:
The action with which to take with the app:

* approve_all — Turn on app pre-approval and set it as the account.
* approve_user — Add users to approved list and set it as the specific user/group.
* disapprove_user — Remove users from approved list and set it as the specific user/group.
* approve_group — Add groups to approved list and set it as the specific user/group.
* disapprove_group — Remove groups from approved list and set it as the specific user/group.
* disapprove_all — Turn off app pre-approval.

user_ids.description: If the action value is approve_user or disapprove_user, the user IDs to add or remove.Maximum limit of 20.

group_ids.description: If the action value is approve_group or disapprove_group, the group IDs to add or remove.Maximum limit of 20.

201.description: HTTP Status Code: 201  App pre-approval updated successfully.

executed_at.description: Date and time this request was executed.

user_ids.description: If the action value is approve_user or disapprove_user, the user IDs to add or remove.Maximum limit of 20.

group_ids.description: If the action value is approve_group or disapprove_group, the group IDs to add or remove.Maximum limit of 20.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `1500`
User can not pre approve this app
**Error Code:** `1404`
application_pre_approved_status_off

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Use this API to get an app's user requests and the status of their approval. 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:read:app_request:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description:
The type of app request to query: 
* `pending` — Only pending app requests. 
* `approved` — Only approved app requests. 
* `rejected` — Only rejected app requests.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`   
 
App user requests returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

requests.description: Information about the users who have applied for app approval.

request_date_time.description: The app request's creation date and time.

reason.description: The reason for the app request.
reason.example: I want to use this app.

status.description:
The status of the user's app request: 
* `pending` — The request is pending approval. 
* `approved` - The request is approved. 
* `rejected` - The request is rejected.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

post.summary: Add app allow requests for users
post.description:
Use this API to add app allow requests for all users, groups of users, or specific users. 

 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:write:app_request:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

action.description:
The action with which to take with the app: 
* `add_all` — Add all user for the app. 
* `add_user` — Add specified user for the app. 
* `add_group` — Add specified group of user for the app.

user_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_user`, the user IDs to add

group_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_group`, the group IDs to add

added_at.description: Date and time this app was added.

user_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_user`, the user IDs to add.

group_ids.description: If the `action` value is `add_group`, the group IDs to add.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

patch.description:
Use this API to update an app's request status or update app status. Administrators can only agree to user-level apps.

 

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:write:admin`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:update:app_request:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

action.description:
The app's action: 
* `approve_all` — Approve all user requests for the app. 
* `approve` — Partially approve user requests the app. 
* `decline_all` — Reject all user requests for the app, users who have been approved will also be declined and the installed apps will be disabled. 
* `decline` — Partially reject user requests for app.
* `cancel` — Cancel partially user requests for app.

request_user_ids.description:
If the `action` value is `approve`, the user's request will be approved.
If the `action` value is `decline`, the user's request will be rejected.
If the `action` value is `cancel`, the user's request will be canceled.

204.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `204`   
 
App request status updated.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist: {$appId}

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

post.description:
Create or update a marketplace application's client secret rotating schedule. 
To call this API, users need to use an OAuth token. The token's `grant_type` should be `client_credentials`. 
Users can only change client secret rotate schedule 3 times in 15 minutes.

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:update:client_secret`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `LIGHT`

requestBody.description: Create or update a rotate secret schedule.

action.description:
`new` - Create a new client secret rotate schedule.
`update` - Update `revoke_old_secret_time` of an existing client secret rotate schedule.

revoke_old_secret_time.description:
Old and new secret will both work until the old secret is revoked.
To revoke the old secret immediately, set this value to `now`.
To set a time to revoke the old secret, this value should be in UTC time format, `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'`. When action = `new`, this time cannot exceed more than 30 days. When action = `update`, this time cannot exceed more than 30 days starting from the initial new request.

secret_id.description: The secret ID of new client secret.

revoke_old_secret_time.description: The UTC time when the secret will be rotated. Can be 'now' or a specific time in UTC.

secret_id.description: The secret ID of new client secret.

revoke_old_secret_time.description: The UTC time when the secret will be rotated. The UTC time when the secret will be rotated. Can be 'now' or a specific time in UTC.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request Request validation failed. **Error Code:** `1500`
Invalid format of request param `revoke_old_secret_time`. Should be in format `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'` for example `2025-03-14T12:34:56Z`.
**Error Code:** `1500`
Invalid request parameter `action`. Can be `new` or `update`.
**Error Code:** `2000`
Working on processing your request. Can only change client secret rotate schedule 3 times in 15 minutes.
**Error Code:** `1500`
Missing request parameters.
**Error Code:** `2001`
Invalid value of request param `revoke_old_secret_time`.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized Unauthorized **Error Code:** `201`
Invalid access token, does not contain scopes:[marketplace:update:client_secret].

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found Not found. **Error Code:** `1401`
App ID does not exist.
**Error Code:** `1401`
Secret ID does not exist.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Get users' webhook call logs and query records from the past 7 days. 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:read`,`marketplace_app:read:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Start date in format: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'`. The "from" and "to" date range must be within 7 days.

parameters.name: event
parameters.description: The event name. All types of events are queried if the parameter is not passed.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The query type: 
* `1` — Query all webhook logs. 
* `2` — Only query failed webhook logs. 
* `3` — Only query successful webhook logs.

parameters.name: retry_num
parameters.description:
The `retry_num` is used to filter webhook logs based on retry attempts. If not provided, all webhook logs are returned regardless of retry status.
* `0` — Filters logs for initial deliveries (non-retry requests).
* `1` — Filters logs for the first retry of webhook requests.
* `2` — Filters logs for the second retry of webhook requests.
* `3` — Filters logs for the third retry of webhook requests.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`   
 
Webhook logs info returned.

next_page_token.description: The API uses the next page token to paginate through large result sets. It returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The page size of the result

webhook_logs.description: A list of webhook logs that match the specified query conditions.

status.description: The http code returned from the endpoint. If the webhook is not sent to the endpoint due to an internal error, the status is `-1`

failed_reason_type.description:
The reason type for connection error messages: 
* `1` — read time out. 
* `2` — connection refused. 
* `3` — hystrix fallback. 
* `4` — hystrix timeout. 
* `5` — async error. 
* `6` — DNS forbidden. 
* `7` — remote error. 
* `8` — in delegate white list. 
* `9` — cert error. 
* `10` — need instant retry. 
* `11` — host name verify failed. 
* `12` — TLS verify failed. 
* `13` — DNS resolve time out. 
* `14` — no client. 
* `15` — resource not found. 
* `16` — too many requests.

date_time.description: The recorded time of the log.

trace_id.description: A distributed tracing identifier used in this webhook request context, commonly used for troubleshooting. When multiple webhook events are triggered within the same context, they may share the same `trace_id`.

request_id.description: The unique identifier for a webhook request, which remains unchanged across retry attempts.

retry_num.description: The number of retry attempts for this webhook request. A value of 0 signifies that the request is the initial send and not a retry.

400.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `1506`
The 'retry_num' value must be an integer within the range of 0 to 3.

401.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `401`
Unauthorized **Error Code:** `201`
You do not have permission to access the targeted resource.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1401`
APP ID does not exist: {$appId}.
**Error Code:** `1501`
The 'to' date must be after the 'from' date.
**Error Code:** `1502`
The date range must be within the last seven days.
**Error Code:** `1503`
The dates must follow the format: `yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss'Z'`.
**Error Code:** `1504`
The 'from' date must be before the current date(UTC).

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Get the app user's entitlements information.

**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_entitlement:read:admin`,`marketplace_entitlement:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:read:list_user_entitlements`,`marketplace:read:list_user_entitlements:admin`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `HEAVY`

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The user ID of the user who's requesting entitlement information.

plan_name.description: The name of the plan of the user with entitlements.

plan_id.description: The UUID of the plan name.

403.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `403`
Forbidden **Error Code:** `1505`
Missing app permissions. Make sure marketplace_entitlement:read:admin scope is assigned.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1002`
No entitlements assigned to the user for the app.
**Error Code:** `1402`
app is not monetized

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

get.description:
Use this API to get all of a user's app requests. 



**[Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace_app:read:admin`,`marketplace_app:read`

**[Granular Scopes](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/integrations/oauth-scopes-overview/):** `marketplace:read:list_user_app_requests:admin`,`marketplace:read:list_user_app_requests`

**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `MEDIUM`

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The number of records returned within a single API call.

parameters.name: next_page_token
parameters.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
The type of app request to query: 
* `active_requests` — All active app requests. 
* `past_requests` - All past app requests.

200.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `200`   
 
User app requests returned.

next_page_token.description: The next page token is used to paginate through large result sets. The API returns a next page token whenever the set of available results exceeds the current page size. The expiration period for this token is 15 minutes.

page_size.description: The number of records returned with a single API call.

app_type.description:
The type of app: 
* `ZoomApp` — A Zoom app. 
* `ChatBotApp` — A ChatBot app. 
* `OAuthApp` — A OAuth app.

app_usage.description:
The app's usage categorization: 
* `1` — The app is under admin management. 
* `2` — Users have access to the app.

app_status.description:
The app's publication status: 
* `PUBLISHED` — The app is published. 
* `UNPUBLISHED` — The app is not published.

request_date_time.description: The app request's creation date and time. This field only returns when the `type` value is 'active'.

request_status.description:
The status of the user's app request: 
* `pending` — The request is pending approval. 
* `approved` - The request is approved. 
* `rejected` - The request is rejected.

allOf.description: Information about the user's app request status.

404.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `404`
Not Found **Error Code:** `1001`
User does not exist or does not belong to this account.

429.description:
**HTTP Status Code:** `429`
Too Many Requests. For more information, see [rate limits](https://developers.zoom.us/docs/api/rest/rate-limits/).

type.description:
The type of deeplink. 
* `1` — Generate a deeplink that opens Zoom App in-meeting if the meeting is in progress, if not opens Zoom App in Apps Tab. \n* `2` —  Generate a deeplink that refreshes Chat App Webview. 

 This value defaults to `1`.

user_id.description: The 'userId' property of the app deeplink. This field only applies to account level OAuth token.

action.description: The action of the deeplink, it's a user-defined string.

**HTTP Status Code:** `400`
Bad Request **Error Code:** `124`
Invalid access token. **Error Code:** `300`
Invalid action. The maximum length of the value is 256.

manifest.description: An app manifest object. It should meet valid manifest schema. This API replaces the entire previous configuration. As a result, the manifest needs to contain all modified and unmodified fields.
